properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 12 at 1:38AM MST until February 12 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Rapid City SD
properties.description:
...SNOW AND BLOWING SNOW EXPECTED TODAY...

.Another clipper system is moving through the Northern Plains this
morning, bringing snow and some blowing snow to the region.
Breezy northwesterly winds have resulted in some upslope snow this
morning. Periods of light to moderate snow with areas of blowing
snow will continue through the day today, then diminish by late
afternoon into early evening.

* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches.
Winds gusting as high as 45 mph.

* WHERE...The Sturgis/Piedmont Foot Hills.

* WHEN...Until 2 PM MST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing
snow could significantly reduce visibility throughout the day.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

Road conditions are available on your smartphone from the
5 1 1 app for your state.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON
